proof.th: A ∧ B ∧ C ⊢ A ∧ B ∧ C
A ∨ B ∨ C ⊢ A ∨ B ∨ C
A ∨ B ∨ C ⊢ A ⟶ (A ∨ B) ∨ C
A ∨ B ∨ C, A ⊢ (A ∨ B) ∨ C
A ∨ B ∨ C ⊢ A ⟶ (A ∨ B) ∨ C
A ∨ B ∨ C ⊢ B ∨ C ⟶ (A ∨ B) ∨ C
A ∨ B ∨ C, B ∨ C ⊢ B ⟶ (A ∨ B) ∨ C
A ∨ B ∨ C, B ∨ C, B ⊢ (A ∨ B) ∨ C
A ∨ B ∨ C, B ∨ C ⊢ B ⟶ (A ∨ B) ∨ C
A ∨ B ∨ C, B ∨ C ⊢ C ⟶ (A ∨ B) ∨ C
A ∨ B ∨ C, B ∨ C ⊢ C ⟶ (A ∨ B) ∨ C
B ∨ C, A ∨ B ∨ C ⊢ (A ∨ B) ∨ C
A ∨ B ∨ C ⊢ B ∨ C ⟶ (A ∨ B) ∨ C

content.name: ex_conj_distrib

proof.th: ∃x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∃x. A x ∧ B x
A x ∧ B x ⊢ A x ∧ B x
A x ∧ B x ⊢ A x
A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∃a. A a
A x ∧ B x ⊢ B x
A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∃a. B a
∃x. A x ∧ B x, A x ∧ B x ⊢ (∃x. A x) ∧ (∃x. B x)
⊢ (∃x. A x ∧ B x) ⟶ (∃x. A x) ∧ (∃x. B x)

content.prop: (∃x. A x ∧ B x) ⟶ (∃x. A x) ∧ (∃x. B x)

content.name: all_conj_distrib

proof.th: ∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∀x. A x ∧ B x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∀x. A x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ A x ∧ B x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ A x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∀x. A x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∀x. B x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ A x ∧ B x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ B x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ ∀x. B x
∀x. A x ∧ B x ⊢ (∀x. A x) ∧ (∀x. B x)
⊢ (∀x. A x ∧ B x) ⟶ (∀x. A x) ∧ (∀x. B x)

content.prop: (∀x. A x ∧ B x) ⟶ (∀x. A x) ∧ (∀x. B x)

content.name: conj_disj_distribL1

proof.th: ⊢ A ∧ (B ∨ C) ⟶ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C
A ∧ (B ∨ C) ⊢ B ⟶ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C

proof.args: disjI1, {}, {A: A ∧ B, B: A ∧ C}
proof.th: A ∧ (B ∨ C), B ⊢ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C
A ∧ (B ∨ C) ⊢ B ⟶ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C
A ∧ (B ∨ C) ⊢ C ⟶ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C

proof.args: disjI2, {}, {A: A ∧ B, B: A ∧ C}
proof.th: A ∧ (B ∨ C), C ⊢ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C
A ∧ (B ∨ C) ⊢ C ⟶ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C
A ∧ (B ∨ C) ⊢ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C
⊢ A ∧ (B ∨ C) ⟶ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C
⊢ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C ⟶ A ∧ (B ∨ C)
A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C ⊢ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C
A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C ⊢ A ∧ B ⟶ A ∧ (B ∨ C)
A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C, A ∧ B ⊢ B ∨ C
A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C, A ∧ B ⊢ A ∧ (B ∨ C)
A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C ⊢ A ∧ B ⟶ A ∧ (B ∨ C)
A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C ⊢ A ∧ C ⟶ A ∧ (B ∨ C)
A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C, A ∧ C ⊢ B ∨ C
A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C, A ∧ C ⊢ A ∧ (B ∨ C)
A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C ⊢ A ∧ C ⟶ A ∧ (B ∨ C)
A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C ⊢ A ∧ (B ∨ C)
⊢ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C ⟶ A ∧ (B ∨ C)
⊢ A ∧ (B ∨ C) ⟷ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C

content.prop: A ∧ (B ∨ C) ⟷ A ∧ B ∨ A ∧ C

content.name: right_or_exists_thm
content.prop: P ∨ (∃x. Q x) ⟷ (∃x. P ∨ Q x)

proof.args: ∃x. P x ∧ Q ⟷ (∃x1. P x1) ∧ Q
proof.th: ⊢ ∃x. P x ∧ Q ⟷ (∃x1. P x1) ∧ Q
⊢ ∃x. P x ∧ Q ⟷ (∃x1. P x1) ∧ Q
∀x. P x ⊢ P x ⟶ (∀x1. P x1)
∀x. P x ⊢ P x ⟶ (∀x1. P x1)

proof.args: exI, {a: 'a}, {P: λx. P x ⟶ (∀x1. P x1), a: x}
proof.th: ∀x. P x ⊢ ∃x. P x ⟶ (∀x1. P x1)

proof.args: negE_gen, {}, {A: P x, C: ∀x. P x}
proof.th: ¬(P x), ¬(∀x. P x), P x ⊢ ∀x. P x

proof.args: exI, {a: 'a}, {P: λx. P x ⟶ (∀x1. P x1), a: x}

content.name: test

proof.th: p a ∨ q b ⊢ p a ∨ q b
∀x. p x ⟶ q x ⊢ ∀x. p x ⟶ q x
p a ∨ q b, ∀x. p x ⟶ q x ⊢ p a ⟶ (∃x. q x)
∀x. p x ⟶ q x, p a ⊢ q a
∀x. p x ⟶ q x, p a ⊢ ∃a. q a
p a ∨ q b, ∀x. p x ⟶ q x ⊢ p a ⟶ (∃x. q x)
p a ∨ q b, ∀x. p x ⟶ q x ⊢ q b ⟶ (∃x. q x)
p a ∨ q b, ∀x. p x ⟶ q x ⊢ q b ⟶ (∃x. q x)
p a ∨ q b, ∀x. p x ⟶ q x ⊢ ∃x. q x
⊢ p a ∨ q b ⟶ (∀x. p x ⟶ q x) ⟶ (∃x. q x)

content.prop: p a ∨ q b ⟶ (∀x. p x ⟶ q x) ⟶ (∃x. q x)
